data.author: Hasan Ahmed
data.testimonialTitle: Service of NRB is beyond expectation
data.testimonialDetails: An international platform to represent Bangladesh. A lot of kind hearted people maintain the community. Love NRB Global. I will always be thankful to NRB Global. Without this community, I could barely stand where I am now.

data.author: Moidul Hasan Khan
data.testimonialTitle: I will recommend NRB to everyone without having a second Thought
data.testimonialDetails: NRB Global helped me to be successful. Excellent level of communication enable people to grow more here. It was God's blessing that I got to know about NRB Globals. My keen interest to start a business was just an dream. With the help of NRB it was possible to make my dream into reality.

data.author: Nusrat Tabassum
data.testimonialTitle: Nothing But NRB Global is your choice.
data.testimonialDetails: NRB Global makes me fill like home in abroad. Different kind of meetings, hangouts are highly appreciable. By joining here, I was able to know more about the foreing policies, how to lead life here, what to do and what to avoid. I will always be thankful to NRB Global.
